pullRequest.title: fix: add test to check the Unpaged class presence in the quarkus spring data api
pullRequest.bodyText:
…ng data api. fix #8571
Goes with quarkusio/quarkus-spring-data-api#3

nodes.bodyText: Please don't use this when you release the artifact. We need to keep with 2.1.xxx
